No one could hear me talking!! This is not a compatibility issue because my cell phone is also Samsung. It is just a fake product, money-wasting piece of junk.
summary: do NOT trust the picture this is a waste of money

reviewText: It's not compatible with T-mobile. Music only played in 1 ear, and headset/button wasn't working!

This is a very nice looking case, and seems to be well made.  The description states it comes with a matching key chain, but that was missing from my box, thus the four stars.  Also, my Blackberry Curve didn't fit as snugly in the case as I expected it to, leaving too much chance that it could fall out if jostled around too much.  I traded my Tour for the Curve before receiving this, but the Tour probably would have fit much better as it's a littler larger.  All in all, this is an excellent value for this nice looking case if your phone/pda is the right one.
The item is not as shown in the pic! Does not work as a phone case, as it is open at the sides.Packaging was terrible. There were bugs in the box!
For those in the construction, public safety, etc area or even just an outdoor enthusiast, this is the case for you.  Very durable and great for your smartphone.
Delivered as promised but snap on belt loop has 1 of 2 snaps defective, it's a great case for my LG Voyager cell/pda otherwise it gets 5 stars

I almost thought I made a big mistake choosing this product when it arrived.  After opening the package, it had an awful very strong industrial smell.  Luckily, it only took a day or too outside the package to completely dissipate.  It works great, keeps my phone in place even when playing on the monkey bars with the kids.  Only drawback is its a little on the heavy side, especially with the phone in it.  If you unbuckle your pants to say do a number one in the men's room, there is a decent shot the package might weigh down your belt and send the whole thing to the ground.  I'd still recommend if you have little kids that like to play rough or if you are in an area where delicate things might be broken easily!

I wanted a case to hold my iPhone 4 while installed in the Mophie Juice Pack Air.  This fits the bill perfectly!  The top of the Juice Pack sits just above the top of the case (almost even) and the width is perfect.  The only problem is that the Juice Pack is thinner than the Sidekick II (which this case was designed for) so there is no retention if you turn it upside down.  I don't think this will be an issue unless you plan on going rock-climbing! It is a very well made case, and not one of those cheap cases you get at the gas station!  I couldn't beleive the quality, considering I paid less than $4.00 for it!  I recommend this to anyone with an iPhone 4 and a Juice Pack!
summary: Great for Mophie Juice Pack Air.

reviewerName: Seven of Nine, Tertiary Adjunct of Unimatrix 01
reviewText: This provides easy access to my bluetooth headset. I don't like to wear it all the time especially if I am wearing large earrings. This allows me to have ready access either on my belt or in my purse clipped to a pocket.Nice little case and it matches my Razr V3 case.
summary: Now I have easier access to my Bluetooth headset

reviewText: The color in the picture is not as nice as the actual color. It has a rainbow skittle purple w/ lilac back. The closure is one big magnet. It is the perfect size for your phone, ID and money if you go out or just don't feel like carrying a wallet or purse.
It is great to find quality products at an affordable price.  Need a good battery.  The people that I purchased form on Amazon were great.

I ordered this phone case with key holder for my daughtr.  In the picture, it appears  very light yellow in color.  In reality, it is mustard.  It is the ugliest thing I have ever seen.  Going back!!!!!

This case is really eye catching.  It was given by me as a gift and it went over really big.  I was surprised at the quality construction.  Very sturdy.  The magnetic close makes access very fast and easy.  It was a really big hit.

My wife bought this phone case for me as a Christmas Gift and I use it with my Samsung flip phone.  I carry a lot of "stuff" in my pockets and was afraid some of it would scratch up my phone.This case has a very secure belt clip that rotates so you can wear the case vertically or horizontally.  I find I like horizontally best because it does not interfere with bending at the waist this way - something I do a lot of.  It uses a powerful magnet closure rather than a snap or velcro.  This works very well and is easy to get into when I need to get my phone, but holds well otherwise. The magnets have not affected the performance of my phone - I was concerned about placing powerful magnets so near a piece of electronics with a magnetic memory card inside.My only complaint was that the case is a bit narrow for a standard flip phone and it was quite difficult to get the phone in the first time or two.  Also, my phone has side buttons that adjust volume, activate the camera and such.  Sliding the phone in and out of the case tends to mash on those buttons and change things.  However, I found that after wearing the phone clipped to my belt and under my sweatshirt for a few days, the case molded itself to the phone rather well.  It's still a snug fit, but not hard to get the phone in and out.  Also, I found a setting on my phone that locks the side buttons once the phone is flipped closed.  This effectively prevents changing my settings.Overall I'm quite happy with the case, it is secure, versatile and comfortable; once it gets worked in.  Sort of like a new pair of shoes I suppose.
Fit my I686 Nextel very nicely. Nice material, soft but durable. Magnet was not as strong as I would've liked it.
This is a quality case,my wife likes green a little hard to find for a flip phone.she loves it.phone fits like a glove.
This case offers good value for the money. It fits several different types of cell phones and keeps them snug. I actually use it for a camera case now since it was much cheaper.

I bought this case from Amazon a couple of years ago, at a cost of around $14.  It has worn well in that time, and the current offering price of around $9 makes this a good buy, considering the quality of the workmanship and materials.  It's in my purse all the time, and the case holds up without showing scratches.  That said, I got it for my RAZR 3 phone.  For that particular model, the phone fits in it loosely.  I had to get a plastic skin for the phone to add just enough thickness in order to have the phone stay in this case.August 13, 2011 update:  This case has held up in my purse; it looks new.  I have replaced my RAZR phone with my husband's old iphone 3G. which also has a plastic skin, and this case fits that phone as well.

I've only had this case for about a week, but I love it.  I was concerned about the magnets affecting my phone, but I've noticed no difficulty so far--I've got an iPhone 3GS, and haven't had any problems with it.  The magnets are powerful, though--at 6 inches, they distorted the color on my CRT (old-fashioned cathode ray tube) monitor.  I didn't get the magnets any closer, because I didn't want to put a "hole" in the image, as magnets can do to such screens.  The case is secure, with a really good fit.  (It has a provision for expansion--two snaps on the back provide two lengths for the "tongue" on the bottom of the case, making room for a shorter or taller phone.  I love the color, too--it's beige...something a little different from black, black, or black.  I wear a pretty narrow belt, and the belt loop for the case was sliding back and forth (no fault of the case--just a result of my narrow belt), so I tether it to a belt loop with a velcro cable tie.

This has to be the best cell phone case I have ever used. Its really tough. I do pool maintance and rub this case against stuff all day. It shows very little signs of wear, the silver buckel is all scratche up but thats ok. At first I was afraid the magnet would not hold the flap down, but I have yet to have my phone ever fall out.

This is probably the best cell phone case I've ever purchased!!I have a LG Cosmos Touch with a rubberized protective case, it fits perfectly.It's easily accessible when needed and is well protected.I'm pretty rough on cases so far this case has done it's job!The magnetic flap is pretty strong which can cause the phone to go into "Bluetooth"mode........but to CURE this I always put my phone back in with the screen facing inward, this took care of the problem.I really like this case! Good job Naztech!SteveM
Great case, looks good too.  Especially appreciate the magnetic closure.  Would recommend to everybody.

My phone was very small because it was one of those freebies when you sign on to a certain plan.  The phone was great but I looked and looked in stores but could not find a case and meanwhile my tiny phone was rambling around inside my purse.  This was not good.  It took my awhile but I found this great little case for my great little phone AND  it's PINK.  Nice leather and a good strong magnet. I love it.

reviewerName: Norma Martinez "The Judge Like No Other"
reviewText: I had first purchased this item to fit my Mp3 player but it was too big.  Hey, it fit my cell phone to a T.  I love the case clip, it doesn't become loose after use, it holds on no matter what job I am doing ( I'm an assistant manager at a lumber yard).

I was looking for a simple vertical holster for my LG enV3 and bought this.There is nothing wrong with the product, but the vague description mislead me.It may be compatible with some LG models, but it is not meant for the enV3 at all.If your phone is smaller, I say go for it. Otherwise look for something else.

I was looking for a simple but well designed case and found it in the Naztech Bravo.  The design is simple but elegant.  The logo is not ostentatious and the white stitching adds contrast.  The case is well constructed with nice leather and a strong belt clip.  It functions smoothly.  The magnetic closure is much easier to use than a snap and quieter then velcro.  The cut outs in the corners make it easy to get my phone out.  I would highly recommend this case.
A gift for a youngster and it came on time and is just what he wanted now can't get him to take it off

I purchased this case for my brother as a Christmas gift.  He had been looking for a case that would keep his smallish flip phone out of his pocket.Considering its price, the case was very well-crafted, and the rich brown leather has a great smell coming out of the packaging. The clip, which holds the case to the belt or waistband, rotates so that it can be worn up-down or sideways on the body.  Depending on whether he is sitting and standing, a guy may want to be able to adjust which way the phone is sitting on his hip, and this clip was sturdy and clicked into place at 45-degree angles.The case was a great size for the clam-style flip phone, and I believe it would probably been big enough that one of the new ultra-thin phones would have bounced around without leaving the foam padding piece in.The fastening is a very strong magnet - you know it's going to stay in place unless you want to open the case.  Once you get a finger underneath and give a tug, however, it opens smoothly. No snaps or zippers or other two-piece fasteners to deal with, and less problems for a closure-failure.I would have given it 5 stars, as it is a really nice little case, but the leather scratched when I was moving the belt clip around and testing it, leading me to think that the leather itself might be too soft to remain "business wear," and would be soon relegated to "casual wear," like a worn-in pair of soft loafers - thus limiting its possibilities.I'd definitely buy another!

Only case of this kind that I could find for the Rugby. The lid (flap) could be a little longer. The first one I bought 3 years ago is still working and in good shape. This one will replace that one when the time comes.
I needed this for my great grandma because she never cares her phone and she is 95.. this works great thank you!

I bought this for my husband, who is in the construction industry.  He has a tendency to be tough on cell phone cases because he hangs them on his tool belt.  He just got a Verizon Brigade (Casio) and was having trouble finding a decent case for it that would hold the phone securely and hang vertically from his tool belt.  This case is tough, durable, secure and hangs on his tool belt perfectly.  He absolutely loves it.
summary: Fits a Casio Brigade like a glove

reviewText: it's a little bulky, but very well built. It is too small for the phone I intended it for (and was listed as it was for my phone) a Casio Brigade. It fits too tight and continually pushes the buttons. I will likely find another use for this case.

I PURCHASED THIS ITEM FOR MY HUSBAND AS HE IS OUT ON THE ROAD ALL THE TIME AND HE KEEPS IT ON HIS BELT. ONE DAY MY HUSBAND BENT OVER AND THE PHONE FELL OUT OF THE CASE AND THE ANTENNA BROKE AND WE HAVE BEEN HAVING NOTHING BUT PROBLEMS WITH THE PHONE SINCE THEN AND NOW NEED TO BUY A NEW PHONE. I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED

Well, I had some doubts when I purchased it.  But after one day when my friend dropped it with my phone from 30 feet height during mountain climbing lesson and phone survived... I'm sure this case completely does its job.
summary: I'm going to buy another one.

reviewText: This is actually the 2nd time I have purchased this case in the past year. My husband is a contractor and is brutal on cellphones and cases. This particular case has held up so well. The only reason I am replacing is the magnet piece broke...more aesthetic than functional. My husband has slaughtered every other type case for his cell, but this one is truly a solid piece. The case has 2 option for hanging, belt loop or a sturdy metal clip. Both option are well made, it is personal preference. We have a Samsung 4G sidekick touch screen in it and it has survived. Excellent choice for the active man/woman looking for a strong case w/o bling.

The case fit my phone, and is sturdy enoughto protect it should I drop it.  That is what happened to my last cell phone, I dropped it on my tile floor and it shattered.  If I had had this case that would not have happened.  I am very happy with the product.

Broke off in my hand right out of package the 1st time I put it on my belt.  Doesn't have a clip, can't swivel, very weak & poorly made anchor system holding case to belt clip.  Do not buy this case look around for a better one It(the Case itself) looks nice, but it is not durable.  I ended up buying a Mobo case that is almost identical and much higher quality.  You have been warned....buyer beware.

I got another one that was supposed to fit my husband's small flip phone but it was way too big/ this is a perfect snug fit for his Motorola ACTV - Mandarin Orange flip phone.It is a little tall for the case, but makes it easier to pull it out. Firm leather case.
summary: nice case for a small flip phone

reviewText: Not much to say about this except it was an extremely hard, non-bending case that was bulky and huge.Did not like, returned and bought a different version of it from the same manufacturer and loved the second one. This is hard and not meant for anything but those big old school square slider like phones
This item did not work with my bluetooth headset.  However, works with a different type of headset that I use.  Works well if you don't need your headset on all the time, which I do.
My Bluetooth ear piece would not even fit in. The clip was so hard to open also that I could not put in visor even if the Bluetooth fit

First, the quality of this product is excellent.  The leather is good, the stiching heavy and evenly spaced.  All quality materials.Now, for the problems.  It won't work with all headsets.  It is almost impossible to use with my Plantronics 360.  The headset is too thick to put in without the risk of breaking something.  Even if it were possible, the behind the ear loop is exposed.  Bump into something and the risk of breakage is there.  Why they couldn't make a simple, enclosed holster with a top flap that you could simply drop the headset in and close the flap, is beyond understanding.  I should point out that if your headset is one of those thin ones that easily fit into it, it will also easily foll out of it.
Love the color choices. Does a good job holding my blue tooth set. Nice quality. Is capable of fitting both my and my wife's bluetooths. Worked out great for me.

This was a junk. I think I returned it, I don't remember. It has been a while. The Bluetooth headset kept falling off... I used to have a Motorola case that kept my bluetooth tucked in well. I can't find that model anywhere anymore.
The case didn't hold my Bluetooth at all. Seems like its for a longer larger case. There making Bluetooths smaller now
I love this item and hope when I need another one in about 3 to 4 yrs, I can still find it.  This arrived in a timely manner and was perfectly wrapped.  Thank you for a great product!
Great case for the price.  I've used it for various smart phones, which is nice since I hate having to keep buying new cases.  It has kept up very well.

I owned this item for 3 months and the belt clip broke off completely. Upon following up with Naztech directly regarding thier Lifetime warranty this was thier response:From: "Naztech Customer Service"  ...We offer a Lifetime warranty for cases that's defective when customer received it. Wear and Tear is not covered  on this warranty. - Naztech Support TeamThe belt clip will break and it will not be replaced.

To me, the design, style and quality of this product are all exceptional. However, I am having to return it, as the magnet closure is powerful enough to interfere with the operation of my phone. (sony w300i) If this was not the case, I sure would have kept it, but as it is, I have to return the thing.I would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for the problem with the magnet.
summary: great case - no good for me, though

reviewText: Great case. Fit my phone perfectly. Doesnt fit my new phone but I got tons of use out of it when I bought it. Held up great and passed it along to a friend.

My husband is brutal with his cell phone cases.  This is the only one we found that held up to his beating.  Because he farms for a living, he is on and off the tractor, in and out of vehicles, working in the fields, etc.  It hold up.
I'm a police officer, and this thing fits my duty gear perfectly.  It does sometimes fall off when I get in or out of the car, but it's better than leaving it in a pocket.

I tend to be hard on the stuff I use... phones, wallets, watches, etc.  i always have to find stuff that is quite durable.  Over the years I've found that leather phone cases fall apart on me.  I saw this case had good reviews and decided to try it out.  I'm glad I did because I finally found a phone case that won't fall apart on me.  The design of the case worked out well for me as well.  The case is removable from the clip.  The only way to remove it is to rotate it until the flap of the case opens downward.  At that point you can slide the case up and out from the clip.I'm in the process of upgrading to a smartphone soon.  I hope I can find a case as well designed as this one.
Well constructed, strong magnetic clasp, fits my E815 well. Swivel is a bit stiff, but I suppose it will loosen up over time.

This is a great holster!  I have the smaller case for flip phones.  Great fit!  I love the magnetic closure.  I like the strong metal belt clip and the snap strap for attaching to backpacks, large belts, etc.  Adjusts for larger flip phone.  Very tough fabric.  Can't go wrong!

This is the best cell phone case/holster I've ever seen. It not only looks heavy duty...it is.  Powerful magnet holds flap down.I would recommend this for anyone who needs protection for their phone in the harshest of environments.I also like the extra clip. Don't miss this one guys.
This is bulkier than I expected, but it will do for my needs. It comes with the extra belt attachment which I don't really need.

I bought a similar looking product years ago and it held up well, was good materials. This one looked the same, but it is made of cheap canvas backed by cardboard. I use this every day and I work construction, so it gets used. The top flap is completely torn through (canvas and cardboard) and the canvas where the metal hook is on the back is also ripped, making the product useless now. My old one held up well over several years, this one did not last 7 months - so I was disappointed, thinking it would hold up like the other one.I will say the magnetic catch is great - never had any problem with it interfering with the phone reception/battery. And the metal plate probably does some good at protecting that surface. The back metal hook and belt loops/hooks are good quality and for the most part stayed where it was supposed to.It did its job at protecting the phone - but for the price it should be made of better materials.
summary: Good design, doesn't hold up over time

reviewText: I work in the underground construction industry and this case really serves well for this type of enviroment. I bought one of these about two years ago and it was getting a little worn so I recently purchased another. This case is very rugged and really holds the phone tightly. The magnetic closure is very strong and is not likely to open unless you want it to. Overall I would recommend this case to anyone and would highly recommend it to construction personell.

still using this after like 2 years. High quality product. The clip start ripping on me and now using the belt attachment. warning the metal parts on this can rip or scratch stuff. did so on 2 steering wheels getting in and out of car.

I bought this for my husband who is a farmer. He likes most everything about the holder except it is a little bulky.It is not completely enclosed which allows the dust to pass thru. The magnet makes it easy to open and has not hindered his phone to not work properly.

Awesome product, highly recommend. My husband is a very active guy and is always losing his cell phone by it coming out of the case and this has taken care of this issue completely. This is a super product and you will not be disappointed.

I purchased this case for my Motorola W755 flip phone.  When I received the item it was inside of a plastic clam-shell that was stapled shut.  When I opened it I found that the case and one of the belt clips was dirty, like it had been dropped on the floor at the factory.  On top of that, the stitching on the canvas belt clip was unraveling on the inside from a poor stitch job that should have been caught by quality control.  I was happy to find that the case fit my phone perfectly, nice and snug.  I wish the case had come with instructions because this was my first experience with the "D" connector on the back of the case and it took me 30 minutes to figure out that you had to turn the case upside down to insert it into the belt clip.  As others have mentioned, the powerful magnet on the front closure of the case does have an effect on my phone.  Fortunately it only affects my phone briefly and only if it comes into direct contact with the magnet.  This is something to consider before purchasing this case.  Overall I have been using the case for 6 months and it is holding up nicely.  The magnetic closure makes it easy to access my phone from my hip when I need it, and easy to return it to the case.  It is too bulky to use as an everyday case, but it works well on a duty belt.
summary: A few problems, but I still like it.

reviewText: Very solid case, like the magnet cover has kept my Palm Treo from popping out the case a real bonus when walking around the trails. Would highly recommend this for anyone. I admit this not as stylist but, better then the leather case that Palm sells on their website.

This seems like a very high quality holster. My Bionic is too tight of a fit to use it though. I am going to save it though, someone else at the store might use it for their phone. Just wanted to warn people though, DO NOT GET FOR A BIONIC! I have attached a link for a holster that works great for me, see my review on there.RUGGED Univ Horizontal Pouch Black Extra Large

this is a great durable phone case. I have dropped my phone a few times and it has NOT broken into a few pieces. The clipping method is great and I know it won't fall off the holster. A great buy for anyone who does work in a labor intensive field or beats their phones up unintentionally.
it was what I was looking for good fit and sturdy construction and price was right. fit my gzone commando fine

This review applies to both the small and medium sized cases. A bit bulky for some owners (this is where I downgraded the case from 5 to 4). Made of very-heavy-weight-nylon-canvas. The silvered latch is heavy-weight stainless steel, and of the magnetic latch that acts as closure of this case. If you want protection,it provides 4/5 protection against bumps, bangs, and collisions against doors, walls and such (no such thing as 5/5 protection unless you buy a high quality metal case)(I wear my Naztech on a belt on my hip). In some instances, Naztech Gladiator may be of concern because the closure is magnetic, and might compromise the magnetic parts of your phone, PDA, mini-digcam. I have not noticed any problems with my cell phone. I am pleased with my  purchase and I have purchased a second case. I would purchase this case again as a gift when appropriate.

I have the smaller version of this case for my Nokia N75 and I love it.  I had a case previously that came off my belt while I was on my motorcycle and my phone was destroyed.  I never worry about this case coming off.  I recently got the Samsung Captivate and have been looking all over for a good case.  I had no idea that they made this in different sizes.

Yes it is a little bulky but if you want to know where your phone is and that it is safe and will not fall out or off your body, than this is the one you need to buy.  I have one that is 8 years old, wore the magnet out of the flap and looked everywhere to buy a second one.  My brother has one and works construction, I was able to give him my second slide through belt clip from my new purchase!  Hands down the best phone holster on the market.

I was looking for a holster/case for my new HTC EVO 4G ahead of it's release. There was not much out there. From the measurements of this I found online, I thought it might work. So, for $20, I decided to give it a shot. The case was here the day before the phone came out. When I got the EVO, it fit right in nice and snug. Note that the case does have open corners, so I would advise using an Innocase or Otterbox style case with this to protect the phone. I would also suggest facing the phone inward. Overall, the case is very well made and will hold up as well as other cases like this I have had before. The magnetic closure is actually very nice. I was not sure about this when I ordered it, however I have been very pleased with it and it stays closed nicely. There is also a nice pocket inside the case on the belt side that is perfect for a spare battery. Those of you with an EVO who use it heavily, like me, will have use for that. This is not a small case, but if you are looking for this style of case, you know that already. Overall, great case holster combo.Update on May 25, 2012This case has held up nicely over the last two years. We upgraded our phones to the HTC Evo 4G LTE  by Sprint. I was concerned that the new phone would not fit into this holster since it is slightly larger. It still fits nicely (in a Seidio Active case). It still has that area for an extra battery. Since the HTC Evo 4G LTE does not have a user replaceable battery, I am planning on getting an external battery which, as long as I don't get a huge one, there will be plenty of room for. They make some that are the same size as or slightly larger than the original Evo's battery.Another update - June 17, 2012When I purchased an external battery for my phone (HTC Evo 4G LTE), it does fit in the case. It does, however, fit VERY tightly and it is difficult to get the phone in and out of the case. Without the external battery with the phone in the Seidio Active case, it fits beautifully. The external battery is slightly larger than my old Evo's extra battery.(The HTC "regular" Evo 4G in a Seidio case - my old phone - with an extra battery fit well.) I will probably hang onto this case for a while longer as it is well made - it outlived one phone so far and is still in great shape, but I will be shopping for another case. This is still a great case if you don't live on your phone when you are away from your desk - so you don't need an extra external battery. This case will still continue to work well with the HTC Evo 4G LTE even in the Seidio Active case.I continue to recommend a case that protects the corners of your phone like the Seidio or the Otterbox cases. They have saved my phone from many accidental drops.
summary: Great Holster/Case Combo For The HTC EVO 4G and HTC EVO 4G LTE!

reviewText: This case was bought for an HTC Evo Shift 4G phone. There are very few cases for the phone to start with. I decided to buy this case because of the other good ratings and reviews for it on here and other online stores. It comes with two different belt attachments, both of which work very well in keeping it on my waist. The phone fits perfectly in the adjustable case so much so you would think it were specifically designed for it. The magnetic closure doesn't seem to cause any interference with any functioning of the phone and is surprisingly strong for a phone case. I highly recommend this case for those with the Evo Shift or similar sized phone.

This product is certainly durable, with metal connections that will not break like the plastic ones.  However, the case is too bulky to be carrying it around indoors.  It would be ideal for anyone working outside, as the device should be well protected.

Although the case I recieved was a very well made and designed case, was not the one I thought I ordered. I wanted the one that adjusts with 2 snaps on the bottom, the one I recieved does not..one size..Not to worry, sold it to a friend for half price and ordered the right one from another company, so I'm not out a great deal of money, just have to watch what I order from now on..

It is a little big for the Blackberry Storm, but still works well.  The only thing I don't like is that it is a little bulky on the waste, and the magnet stops the phone from ringing when you get a call.  Other then those 2 minor things I like it.

This may not be the most stylish case out there, but having had the smaller version for my last Nokia for 3 years (and it was still going strong), I was more than excited when I found out that they made this larger version.  I bought this to go with my new Palm Pre, the phone fits great, and the extra spots in the elastic bands are great for carrying a small flashlight or pocket knife.  The holders (both metal clip & Belt clip) are great.  Spending a lot of time in scrubs, this comes in handy having both.  The phone never moves, and when I have dropped the case with the phone in it, I have never done ANY damage, it really is the true Gladiator.  :)  I couldn't recommend this case enough!!!

Bought in Oct, 2010 and still going strong, not even a scratch, and kept my phone super safe. The steel pin is just perfect after you spend so much replacing plastic pin. Although this one is still intact, I have to replace it for a slimmer version to fit better my new Nexus 5. But even so, this one will continue to be used on the old phone.
summary: 3 years of usage, still intact and kept the phone safe and secure.

reviewText: My husband purchased a similar item made by this company at full retail at a local store(needed it now kind of thing)(Black) Naztech Ikon Belt Clip Carrying Leather Case for Motorola w315, v365, v3,v3c,v3i,v3r,v3t,v3x,v3xx, A1200,a630,a840,c139,c290.  I was really impressed with the quality. I fished around to find one for myself, never having seen a holster with a little wallet kind of thing attached, but I was hoping.  When I found one by Naztech, and at less than half the price hubby paid, with the wallet included, I was thrilled!  A friend yesterday looked at it and said, "Good grief, that's NOT junk!". A bit of an understatement!  The materials and workmanship are unparalleled, watch the magnet though, the whole thing will stick to the fridge;-) It is a little clumsy till you get used to it, but it's a lot less clumsy than a purse!  I can keep my DL, cash, credit cards and business cards and my phone and hook it onto my belt or pocket - and the clip is an extremely heavy pivoting spring clip that I would think impossible to break (if it can be broken, it'll b me!) I love this thing!!!!  Security for everything!

As others noted the quality is great even though made in China. My RAZR phone fits perfectly even with a cover on it. The color and design are exactly as pictured. The attached purse is credit card size and a little over an inch thick. There is one divider inside it, so its not really made for carrying change, although you could. I find it very handy so that I do not have to carry a purse. The belt clip is well made and does not rotate.I am very pleased and expect to get years of use out of it-it will probably outlast the phone!

I am very impressed by this item's quality- very nice leather workmanship. It is also a very secure place to put your phone. It has a very strong magnetic closure and enough room inside to put lip balm, credit cards and money. (It does not have a wrist loop.) I highly recommend this item.

I purchased this case hoping to be able to keep debit/credit cards and DL without the need to carry a wallet. This appeared to be the perfect product. However, within a couple of weeks the part of the case that actually holds the phone started to seperate. It is not stitched at all but appeared to be poorly glued together. The wallet portion is very well made and the phone case portion is stitched to the wallet portion. I would not have this case even if it was free. Again I had to replace it in a couple of weeks due to extremely poor craftsmanship. Stay away from this product.

Love the case. It looks like a "million bucks" and is very protective, however, if your main thing is to use the 8125 as a phone constantly then the case will be frustrating. It is difficult to get it out in time to answer the call. Otherwise, it is strong and functional with several ways to hang on your belt or be put into your pocket.

Oh, it's a great idea, in theory.  To be able to have cellphone conversations while driving down the road, without holding one's phone, without a stupid headset, rather just talking naturally, with the other person's voice coming out crisp and clean through the car stereo speakers.  Beautiful.And maybe that's what it's like, if you have a car with a properly integrated bluetooth system.  If you don't, there's the Scosche DIYBRH.  You plug it into your cigarette lighter plug, and into your audio system's auxiliary input, and you're good to go.  Its microphone picks up your voice, and trasmits the whole conversation through the speakers.  A bargain at $90 or so.  Right?Wrong.  This product should never have been released into the market.  It is a total piece of junk.  Sound quality is absolutely awful.  The microphone barely works.  Worst of all, the lighter plug is so badly designed that the slightest bump causes the whole unit to turn off, instantly breaking the connection and shutting off the call.  And every time that happens, you have to go through a complex process of re-syncing it with your cellphone, because it has no memory or backup battery for connections whatsoever.  What it adds up to is, this ended up being an absolutely worthless piece of cheap plastic.  I would never consider buying a product from this company again and strongly suggest that you avoid this one.
summary: Can't believe I paid almost $100 for this piece of junk

reviewText: I pay 25 dollars for this device and it works well, the only thing was that I delay almost 2 hours to establish conection between te transmitter and the receptor.

Plugged into any device other that iPod: Works for 5-10 minutes then loses the connection with no apparent cause.With iPod: Keeps the connection open, but sound randomly drops for a fraction of a second, several times a minute, if the transmitter is > 6 feet from the base station. (Note: I have no problems with any other BlueTooth item I own within my house) This is VERY obnoxious, and means it the device effectively has just a 6 foot range.

This thing works like a charm. I own aApple 60 GB Black iPod Video AAC/MP3 Player (5th Generation)and the Motorola Krzr K1m Sprint phone, which sadly does not feature stereo bluetooth and I was looking for a solution for this unnecessary issue (Motorola should've built in stereo bluetooth along with it's mp3 player). The Scosche Blulife Home Kit was the answer to my prayer. Not only could I use the transmitter with my phone to send stereo audio to my bluetooth headset, the reciever can be used for sound in the home or vehicle. A beautiful thing.For my video Ipod, I can connect the standard 3.5" jack and send the signal to either the receiver, which connects via any RCA connection, or to mySony Ericsson Bluetooth Headset HBH-DS970. One important thing to point out is to know what you want to do with your devices, then, read the manuals for all your devices thoroughly. I admit I did have trouble the first time around with the HBH-DS970 pairing to the transmitter and the phone simultaneously, but once I spent time with the manual, I followed the clear instructions and was able to achieve my goal of being able to switch back and forth between music and phone calls. It s all about the single/multiple switch button on the headset. The only gripe I have if  any, is the size of the transmitter, which could get bulky if you intend to connect it to your portable devices on the go. Otherwise indoor use not a problem whatsoever.Here's The Breakdown:Pros: Fast automatic pairingNo compatibility issuesUser FriendlyDurableComes with various size holsters for the different Ipod typesPrice - very affordable and appropriateBattery LifeMake your non bluetooth phone (or other device) into a bluetooth  phone (or other device)Cons: Transmitter a bit bulky for use with phone adds bulk to IpodHighly recommended!

First I considered the transmitter as a secondary part to the purchase.  As other have said it's bulky.  It does work though.  If the transmitter from an Ipod or other device is a big part of your mental math, realize that the transmitter is larger than an Ipod Nano 3gen.  For me this device sits by itself most of the time on a shelf as I don't need it.  If I had then my review would have dropped a star.The main point for me was the receiver for the stereo.  This device has worked flawlesly.  I have paired it with computers and palm devices on the fly to play sounds and music.  It took some time to find a slot it would work on with my 1980's era receiver, but once found it's been great.The only other note I have is that the power adaptors for the transmitter and receiver are remarkably similar but not interchangeable.  Be careful about this.All in all for the low $20's price tag I paid, this has been a great purchase to adapt my stereo to playing from my blue tooth devices.

This Product is Great, it connects my PC to my Stereo and the sound is great, it's only Stereo sound and not digital, but for what it is, I'm very pleasantly surprised.  I did have one hiccup when trying to connect it to my computer.  It needs the security PIN to pair which was not listed in the instructions, as it is mostly designed for iPods and such, I had to call technical support, but they were very helpful and took care of my issue within a couple of minutes.

The product came in defective--when it is connected, it seems to work beautifully--however, I keep getting disconnected intermittently every 10 minutes or so.  I caled Scosche and I was directed to my merchant to get a replacement.  I am still waiting for a replacement to get mailed to me.

I got this case three days ago and I just love it.  The brown looks classy, and the case as a whole is very well made.  If you have the slim and sexy MotoRazr V3 then wrap it in this slim and sexy case.
Love the c clamp and the additional straps that come along.  GREAT FOR THE PRICE and the product is GREAT quality
This product was exactly as advertised.  I was very pleased, got exactly what I expected.  Everything was new and in great shape.

I was looking for a case that was useful and easy to see for my flip phone.  I found it in this one.  I have not lost my phone once since I received this.  I think it looks great and is very well made.  I would definitely buy this item again if needed.  The only thing I question about this product is what the long velcro strap is for.  I don't need it, but I am curious.  If you need a great cell case for a flip phone, this would be the one to purchase.

I was very pleased with the high quality of this phone case - and amazed at the price! The case, arm band, and lanyard are of high quality materials and construction and I'm very pleased with this purchase.  However, I had planned to attach it to my purse, since mine doesn't have an outside phone pocket, but decided not to carry my phone that way - so haven't used the case at all.

As most of my orders are for gifts,but as soon as hubby seen it(he took it)the color is great.The belt clip is so strong.No way can he lose it now.Plus he loves the arm band is very well made as is the exterior.And the case fits all 5 of our cell phones.Its easy access also.He said no struggling to get his phone.This is a great price on this case.it would be great in different colors.Shipping was time.

I have an older Samsung flip phone model- its pretty thin and compact even when folded down and I couldn't find a case anywhere. I decided to take a chance and what a beautiful little case! My phone fits and because of the plush lining theres no movement but still room even if I had a different model phone. The color is a pretty light green w/ beige velcro closure. It has an attached metal belt hook on back, comes w/ a key clip and a long strap. I think its a great case and with all the accessories included you cant beat the price :)  I wish more colors were available!
I really enjoy using my Naztech universal cellphone case.I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a small,durable, easy access phone case.
Love this case, I have a virigin mobile flip phone I carry in it.  Would recommend it to others.  You want find a good quality case for this price!
Good case for the Treo.  Magnetic piece worked really well.  Not too tight, and not too loose.  It does stick out quite a bit from a belt loop, but the Treo is a pretty big phone too.
Was well worth the long delivery...lasted me several yrs.
Works fine to charge my 4S or Pad 2. Bulky and not very aesthetic, but can't expect anything different for the price. Happy with it.
summary: Bulky but cheap and works fine

reviewText: This charger, just wouldn't charge... probably it was not chosen well, but at most....could have been used as was anticipated........

I ordered this charger for my iPhone4 to charge while I was at work. The company that shipped this item sent it very fast and I do believe shipping was free, however this charger takes FOREVER to charge my device. I could plug my phone into the standard charger that came with it and it would take an hour and a half. This charger takes longer than 4 hours. It just sits there. Im going to keep it because it is a backup that I need while at work but I defiantly wouldn't recommend it to anyone. Therefore it only gets 2 stars.
summary: Well, the shipping was the only thing fast here...

reviewText: My order was place on 7/03 the sender did not bother to ship the package untill 7/11 when I got the package the charger worked good by the 5th day of use it completely shut off does not work at all. I tried pluging the charger in all of my outlets no luck.I receieved an email from the seller telling me to give a 5 star and for me not to leave a negative review to contact them before .I did send an email back 7/20 letting them know about my problem with the charger and has not yet replied to me about the charger ? Not a good investment 5 days of use not worth buying .
I am annoyed b/c this will not work with my iPhone Otterbox cover. I am not going to take off my cover every time I charge my phone, so this was a waste.
This charges VERY SLOWLY.  Would not recommend. Have bought others that do a better job. Cable is not very long.
The little red light didn't turn on at first when I plugged it in. I tried many outlets, etc. Finally in frustaration I banged it against the wall. Then it worked. A good buy for a low price.

This is a nice affordable charger. The only negative thing I would have to say about it is it is soooo short. When my phone is almost dead and I am on a call or need to do something on the phone, I have to sit by an outlet. Otherwise it is great!

For the price, this is a great buy.  It charges my iPhone 4S, but takes noticeably longer than the Apple cable + wall plug.  If you've got time to let your device charge, say overnight, this is a great product.

First of all, the charger I received did not match the one pictured.  The charger pictured has a static set of plugs that do not move - the charger I received has plugs that fold in and out.  That was the root of the problem.  From the first day I received the charger I couldn't fold the plugs all the way out, but I could fold them out enough to be able plug the charger into the wall and charge up my iPhone 4.  Fast forward a few months later and now it's impossible to get the plugs to fold out enough to get the charger to stay in the wall socket.  Now I have a paperweight that will not charge my iPhone.  Stay away from this charger.
Works well for the iPhone 3G.  90% lower price than a similar generic model at an AT&T retail store.  I haven't had any issues with this wall charger.

I was looking forward to getting a new charger for my iPhone and didn't want to pay a bunch for the Apple charger.  Ordered this one and at first glance it appeared to be pretty decent.  Unfortunately, it was broken within the first 2 hours of getting delivered to my house.  The charger has prongs that flip up and down for easier packing, but the function causes a weak point in the product.  I tried to plug it in the wall, heard something inside snap, and the prongs folded halfway into the charger.  I'm no gorilla and used no more force than I normally would use while plugging something in. I was able to still use it after removing the cover and tweaking it, but the quality of this product is rather poor.  You can't expect much for a $4 phone charger though. Also, be advised that although this will work for the 3GS and the 4, it will not work for the 3GS with an OtterBox Defender.  The iPhone 4 with an OtterBox Defender will work with no problems.  All that said, if you want a quality product that will last a while, spend a little more and avoid this product.
Not worth buying this product. It's totally garbage and piece of junk not worthy product. Buyers read the reviews before buying this junk.

I ordered two of these chargers for my iphone4.  The device adapter does not fit into the phone at all, it only charges when you hold it yourself.  Once you let go, the adapter slips and the phone is not charging.  Perhaps it fits tightly for older models, but for me it was a waste of money and time.
You can never have enough chargers.  I ordered some as extras and they work on the iPhone 3 and the iPod Touch.  They are sturdy and plug in easily.

Just as good as the expensive items you buy from apple or even in commercial stores.  No difficulty with charging at all.  Seems as quick as others.  A couple have stopped working after about 4 months but the more expensive ones don't seem to last either - so I would rather buy the cheap ones.  I bought 5 of them - one I keep in my purse, one in my office, my husband has one in his office, one in his briefcase, and we have another we keep on the main level of our home.  Great purchase - well worth the money.

Read the reviews on this site and ordered three of the chargers on June 30 given the price.First problem: The charger plug has a thicker layer of plastic around it than the standard Apple cables, so the plug will not fully seat when inserted into the phone if you are using a phone cover that protects around the phone slot.  I have a thin CaseLogic cover on my iPhone 3GS, and the charger plug would not fully insert in the phone.  It would stay loosely in the phone and would charge as long as you did not move the phone, or otherwise the plug would slide out of position.  My daughter has a thicker phone cover and the plug would not insert at all without removing the phone cover first.Second problem: The adapter I received is not the same as the one shown in the picture, which looks sturdier.  The ones I received break easily.  Of the three, only one is still working.  One just stopped working.  The second one broke when being pulled out of a wall socket.  The wall plug portion of the charger can be flipped in and out of the charger, and it appears the hinge inside the charger is flimsy.  It broke when we removed it from the wall socket and I could no longer fully flip the plug out of the charger to plug back into the wall.You get what you pay for.Only one works now and we're planning to toss it once our order for theBelkin Rotating Charger for iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4 & iPod F8Z418bNLarrives.
summary: Not as great as many have reviewed...

reviewText: Absolutely abymsal. Come to think of it i wasn't really expecting anything less than this from the low price. This is my first amazon review and i only logged on to write it because this is the first time I have ordered something and it has not worked!The problem is it will not charge unless you hold the cable close to the iphone 3G and of course- unless you want to spend 2-4 hours holding it to charge- thats ridiculous.
summary: You have to hold cable in order for it to charge

reviewText: Exactly as promised, I use this at home and work with no glitches at all.  Would recommend for others to purchase.
It's pretty but it won't charge my iPhone 4. I was excited to get it since I didn't have a travel charger - it won't work at all on my phone -
The wire tore after two weeks so it was a waste of money. Good iPod touch wall chargers are so hard to find.

This does what it is supposed to do and seems fairly durable. Reasons I gave it a 4: Annoying red light is always on...might not seem like a big deal until you have it plugged into next to your bed at night, in a totally dark room that red light is very very noticeable/annoying. Also, it does NOT fit my phone with my Otterbox case on it...defeating the purpose I bought it for (a back up charger) since I am not taking my phone out of the case. I gave it to my GF, her and her parents have iPhones and they don't have an Otterbox.

When you plug this into the wall, it does not stay. It simply slides out and you must hold pressure to it, to hold it in. As soon as you plug it into your iphone, it says THIS ACCESSORY IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH APPLE. DO NOT BUY THIS! BEWARE! I had to return mine ASAP! Spend your money and BUY THE REAL DEAL! This product is NOT EVEN WORTH THE CHEAP PRICE, its listed as!
summary: Do NOT buy this product! This product is terribly made. BEWARE! I RETURNED THIS ITEM ASAP!

reviewText: For the price this charger is pretty nice. Physically I found it to be a little big, and it does not charge as fast as my OEM charger. I wanted a charger to leave at my girlfriends house, this was in my price range, it feels very well built.
Works well.  I like that the electric prongs do not collaspe since that is where I have had problems in past.  We buy in bulk for company iphones and this item is cheap and does the job.
It worked for like 5 months but then it won"t work!The light isn't turning on but i don't know why.Can someone help me??

Needed a spare charger for travel days. Upon arrival I tested the charger and it worked perfectly. It may not be the same quality as the Apple provided charger, but for the price it can't be beat. Wish I had bought two.
Is there any hope I will get one of these days?Or is this a net loss?I have not received this item yet. Is it shipped from China?Or the Moon?
summary: I have not received the carger after one month

reviewText: Does not work at all. The prongs are too loose in the wall socket so it doesn't get any power.
I ordered this for myself my grand-daughter  use it and decided she wanted it for her self great quality for your money
Had this charger for about a month before it started falling apart.  The prongs on the plug both came loose and got stuck in the electrical outlet.  Very poor quality.
summary: Not even worth the low price

reviewText: I ordered more than one of these chargers and cables.  Most would not connect with the IPhone 3gs but worked okay on the Iphone 4.  I gave most of these away to friends and family.  They would connect after several attempts but I couldn't count on them all of the time.  The price was cheap so I didn't want to send them back.  The cables were fine but the chargers didn't always work.

Have bought 6 chargers for my iPod Nanos in the past 6 months;  this is the only unit out of the group that does everything (all functions) that the Apple brand charger does.  The package is labelled as if it were a genuine Apple product, but I don't think that it is.  I suspect that it is a clone. However, it is easy to figure out what is going on when you use it -- it is not simply a supply that charges the battery.
good price ....only thing i wish was different was a little longer cord, but iv'e bought 4 of these to have for all the devices in my household and for travel.
this really does the job very well....I wish I would have purchased a second one to have around.  This comes in handy to have one at home and at the office.

Worst charger I've ever owned. After 3 days of use one of the metal prongs came off and got stuck in the wall outlet. You pay for what you get. My lesson has been learned, I will not buy from this seller, or off brand products.
This charger works well with our IPhones and IPod Touch 4th Generation.  Needed extra wall chargers and these were inexpensive, but work well.

It says that this charger could work with the IPhone 3GS.  However, the charger only works with my Iphone when I plug it into a wall outlet (it doesn't work with extension cords) and that is only part of the time.  Most often I get the message "Charger does not work with this device."  It's really a pain to have to find an outlet that the charger will accept.
Poorly made product. Connector to the phone broke within 12 days of purchase. Cheap price, poor quality. Not worth it.
summary: It was good while it lasted (12 days)

reviewText: i bought this item for the same reason as many other reviews, it was a lot cheaper than going through the apple store. unfortunately i have a case on my iphone and everytime i need to use this charger i have to take the case off. the part that actually plugs into the iphone is much bigger than any other iphone charger i've used. it's very inconvenient. other than that it charges really well i just would not buy it again knowing how much bigger it is
summary: terrible if you have a case

reviewText: Purchased this because of the price.  Worked for one day, then would not charge my iphone.  Pulled the plug from the wall and noticed it melted to the point wires were showing.  Buy at your own risk.
summary: You get what you pay for

reviewText: Charger stopped working after 2 weeks.  Light is on, and the charging indicator on the phone even comes on, but it never actually takes a charge.  The brand name charger works fine, so it's not the phone....
Charges the iPhone3Gs and iPhone4 just fine. For the price it's well worth it. The wire is very short though. Also it's bulky head may not work with all cases.

I write this review after having used it everyday for a week. This charger works great for my iTouch III. It fits tight and secure, which is much better than another brand charger I bought from a local store. I think it gives my iTouch a full charge according to the battery indication app on my iTouch.
This is a great product, it's wonderful not to have to use my computer to charge the battery all the time.
Don't want to do any review do not post this there is no way to cancel this review so hopefully you can see that I am not interested in any review so please take my name off this. Please and thanks
This product did not last.  I thought I was getting an extra charger for my den area so that I would not have to move the one in my bedroom.  It stop working after a few uses.

I took a chance on this item, but it did not work to charge my iPhone 3GS as described.  I do not recommend.  My husband was able to get it to work for his IPod touch, but the charger is annoying - you have to squeeze the sides to get it to plug in.  It's really a piece of junk. You get what you pay for.

When it arrived I went to plug it in and noticed one of the prongs was bent. I went to bend it back and it broke! Then I noticed rust at the base of the broken prong. I'm sending it back for a refund and won't be buying another one.
"This accessory is not compatible with your device". Thats what you see when you plug it in. I decided to give it a try considering it was so cheap, should've known better.

The wall charger works fine on my iPhone 3G.What I would change:1) Lengthen the cord.  The cord is short--2 feet 6 inches.  That means your iPhone will need to be close to the wall outlet while it is charging.  Another foot of cord would be an improvement in my opinion.2) Speed up shipping.  Prime shipping took 8 days from order to receipt.Bottom line:  A convenient charger for both home use and for trips.  No need to fire up your computer to charge your iPhone.
Does not work with iPhone 3GS at all. First time I tried it it said Accessory not optimized for iPhone. I think Amazon should remove the listing.

This was a life saver, I absolutely loved it. It works great...for the first couple of weeks. After a month or so, I noticed that it was draining my battery when I first plugged it in, but then it charged. I would say I had it for two or three months and then it fell apart and stopped working.For the price, though, it was great while it lasted!
summary: iPod Charger - Great while it lasted

reviewText: The IPhone charger will not fit my IPhone 3GS phone.  I even took off my Otter Box case and tried it.  It still didn't work. The plug is not long enough or the housing around the plug is too big to let it complete the connection with the IPhone.  I want to return it and get one that works.
For a little over $2, I can find no faults with this charger. I bought two of them for our iPhones, have used them on a few dozen long trips, and they still work perfectly fine.

This charger works very well, there are no problems with it and it is a lot cheaper than getting a charger from the Apple store. I am very happy with it. The one thing that might annoy people (not me) is that there is always a small red light on whenever it is plugged in, though it's not a huge deal.

The charger I received looks different from the picture, but definitively more stylish with an apple look.  It charges my ipod touch 4 pretty quick (time equitable to the USB line). I just hope that it won't fry my ipod in the future (well, consider the fact that it's cheap + made in China). But anyway, so far so good. Worth give it a try if you dare!
DO NOT buy this charger. You will probably never see this review because nobody wants you to know what this charger will do to your Apple device!! It will destroy it!
i use this for my itouch and it works great! it's super convenient and the price is amazing! I highly recommend this product!
does what its supposed to without any problems. i would like it to have a longer cord though. i would definitely recomend it

This did not work on 2 different Iphone 3gs that I tried charging.The phone displays the following error:"Charging is not supported with this accessory"I got a replacement which also had the exact same problem.While I had no problem getting my money back, the product does not work... so it gets the lowest rating.
summary: Does not work for my iphone 3gs

reviewText: This travel charger for the iPhone fits my iPhone 4 just fine, charges just fine, and it's sturdy. I see know problems with this item.
I would have given the charger 5 stars, but you have to completely take off the otter box for the item to charge on the 3Gs iphone.
summary: Works, but not with otter box on 3GS iphone

reviewText: Love it because it doesnt come apart like the other chargers. The only thing is that I wish it was longer.

I bought this for my son's iphone. He used it for a couple of months, then I plugged it in and the plug sparked, I unplugged it from the wall and unplugged the phone right away. But it was to late, bricked his phone. Pay more and get an apple charger I wish I had.
it's been working great for almost 2 months now and it was so cheap! i would recommend this to anyone.. the only thing i don't like very much is the short wire

It looks like a great deal, so I bought four (in the back of my head I was kind of assuming one or two would be DOA). All four were defective. My iPhone 3G shows the plugged-in symbol but the battery never fills; this was true for all of them. My phone went dead overnight plugged into one. Not that I'm out a lot of money, but I think 0 for 4 is fraudulent regardless of the price.
summary: None of the four chargers I got worked.

reviewText: I liked the way this looked, thinking that it appeared durable.  I ordered two of these based on the price.  Neither of the two chargers worked.  Do not purchase!!

Not sure why anyone would pay full retail for an Apple iPod charger when this thing does the job for a fraction of the price.  Buy a couple and keep one in your travel bag, one as a back-up, one plugged in the back of your stereo receiver, etc.

We purchased this so called premium wall charger to charge our I Phone, thankfullyI was charging my IPod touch when it shorted out and ruined my Ipod, when it shorted out it sounded likearcing electricity I was afraid to touch it to get the plug out of the wall, buyers beware don't buy cheapChinese made products because there is no way to hold BestDealUSA accountable for the damage doneto our device, all they did was refund the purchase price $3.04 that was really big of them don't you think!!!!!!!!!!!!

I didnt get the product frist because some how it got lost so i called the company they where really nice and sent another one for free i got it like 3 days later its works like a charm so much better then using my computer for a charger. don't read the bad reviews great product and cheap.

They lasted 3 days. When I received them, they were doing a strange noise of moving piece inside. After 3 days, one side was already not working... They are cheap, but they do not last. Must be avoided!

I just received these earphones today! The shipping only took 2 days when it was supposed to take much longer. So far, the sound quality is great & it even came with earphone covers. I just hope these last me for a while but if not, hey, they were only 2 dollars.

I ordered the first MP3 Shuffle (newest model) in February, 2011.  After adding music to it and listening to it for about 30 minutes. I put it away in my desk.  Two days later I got it out to listen more and it played about 1 song and I heard a raspy noise. The Shuffle then went off and I couldn't get it back on -- even after re-charging it.  I sent it back and a new one was sent to me (even before the first one was sent back to Amazon).  I had the exact same problem with the second one I was sent.  In my opinion, Amazon got a bad batch of these Shuffles and I don't want to take my time to keep sending them back.  gbyrd

The plastic right at the jack pulled apart and the wires are now showing. It came apart the first week of using it. Very dissapointed with the sound quality, it sounds like there is a hollow echo and tinny.

reviewText: If you think you are getting a nice replacement for your Apple iPod, do not buy these, the ear buds you get from Bargincell are made by GT Max, NOT Apple!They should not put an Apple ear bud picture in their ad!!They do not sound good at all, very tinny, no bass, but for less that 2 bucks, I do not feel that bad, just don't make the same mistake I did.Fool me once, shame on you, fool me twice, shame on me!
summary: You get what you pay for

reviewText: I really needed a cheap pair of earphones at the time and came across this item. To be honest I was very excited to find some this cheap but something in the back of my head was telling me that it was too good to be true, but I bought  it anyway considering I needed some form of entertainment to get through those unbearable train rides to school. Anyway the product took almost the whole estimated period to arrive and that killed it for me but nevertheless I was excited to finally have earphones. The appearance and feel of the product right off the batt told you it was a cheap imitation of the iPod earphones. The product lasted me a week during which one speaker stop giving sound and then finally breaking apart. This made me very upset because I actually took care of it pretty good. In closing I'd recommend buying higher quality earphones that lasts a couple months Instead of some makeshift ones that only last days, and despite the price it just isn't worth the hassle.
summary: You Get what you paid for.

reviewText: This cable was great as a data cable and does everything it says in the listing. Seems the design of the phone is messed up and we will have to carry around a car charger, wall charger (not needed if you have this cable and a computer with you), and this data usb cable for data transfers.

i was surprised with the price for the combo. i dont think u can get it for any lesser. as of now, its working great.

The battery works and fits fine.  Having bought it for my teenage sons phone however, i should have checked to make sure his phone was black...it was white.  Oh well, it still works and I earned a full fledged eye roll.

reviewText: The product photos for this item show an *extended* life LG battery rated at 1200mAh. However, if you buy this item, you will actually receive the *standard* 800mAh LG battery, as the product name for this page indicates. There is a separate page for the extended life battery which -- at the time of this writing -- costs $10 more.

This is a good product. I have in the past purchased the black version, which I still use. The color however is much shinier than the picture displayed here. The holster clips can break, especially when getting up after being seated. Which mine has done in the past. It is bulky, but I like it. I would recommend purchasing extra holster clips. Shipping on this item was in a timely fashion. I give this product three(3) stars.

I'd hoped this case was a translucent smoky color, but it is pretty much opaque. You cannot read the printed letters or numbers on the keys at all. There is a subtle crease between keys so you can (barely) tell where they are. Eventually I got used to it. The case fits well on my Motorola L6 phone, and offers good protection. I also use a transparent screen cover.Note that the L6 has only one side volume button- if your phone has two volume buttons, you may have the L7 which looks similar, but is not the same. This case would fit overall on the L7 phone, but the buttons would not match the cutouts.  I found this out, because the first case I got (elsewhere) advertised as "L6/L7" turned out to be designed particularly for the L7 model.

I love my Motorola SLVR but the Motorola people need to get their act together when it comes to cases and covers for this great phone! First of all, you can't see the number keys and other buttons when you put this case on. Be prepared to accidentally hit 4 instead of 1, etc., if you buy this. I finally cut out that part of the skin case.Also - the hole on the top right-side of this case is does not correspond to the size of the headset! If you move around with the headset plugged in it loosens up! Several times while talking on the phone using my headset or listening to iTunes, I've had the headset unplug halfway.There is no hole in the case for the volume buttons on the top left! How practical is that? I had to cut my own hole for the volume buttons and will likewise enlarge the headset port hold too since the headset keeps coming off.The ONLY reason to get this particular skin case is that it is black. The other colored skins hide the beauty of the phone.The SLVR is the best phone I've ever had and I'm very happy with it. The only complaint I have is that NONE of the current soft or hard cases/covers work with the phone.
summary: Horrible accessory for a great phone

reviewText: I have gotten so many compliments on my phone since I purchased this skin.  It is pretty unusual.  My phone is so thin and slippery it was hard to hold onto and this skin solves that problem.  It also protects my phone if dropped.
Good product. It was just as i expected and it came in a reasonable amount of time. It helps my phone from being scratched up. I'm happy with the product i purchased.

I think the battery is not the culprit for me having to buy my 3rd one in the past 6 months. The phone itself is flawed in that it lets the user drain the battery completely. The second problem is that the phone will *not* work without the battery even if you plug it in (that's just stupid). Lastly, if you let a lithium battery die completely (especially this one), it cannot hold a charge and thus ruins the battery.So, right now I'm left with purchasing another battery to resurrect some data that's on my dead phone. It really is just a brick when nothing works! I have since moved on and gotten myself a blackberry. It's a godsend and much more worth my time and money than the Cingular 8125.FYI: it's no longer supported in Cingular/AT&T; stores, so you have to order everything for this phone. reviewText: First, I have to say that I'm not sure if it is my 8125 that is acting up, or these batteries, as I installed the latest ROM and at the same time switched to these batteries.My experience since has been that if the device isn't fully charged, and I have it in the cradle, frequently the orange charging light turns off, and while the software claims it is still charging, it actually is only getting hot and draining the battery.If you drain the battery enough, it's dead, and you won't be able to charge it again (that's true for the original OEM battery also.)-----------5-6 weeks later:I really can't recommend these batteries, since I have to constantly watch the charging light, and if it's off, I have to turn the device off and wait until the charging light comes on (sometimes 10 or more minutes later.)And yesterday one of the three batteries I bought had a fit and I couldn't even hard-reset my PPC.------------Of course I don't know how the OEM batteries compare.
Even when a generic spare, it does the job, chrges and stnads as my old battery in its days. So far, so good

reviewerName: Rosa L. Tysor "Say something about yourself!"
reviewText: I have had my Cingular 8125 for several years now, and have never felt the need to "upgrade" to a newer phone since mine already has basically all of the features any of the newer phones have.  Suddenly, my phone began acting up -- the battery would die so quickly it would turn off before it even gave the low battery warning light.  Sometimes it would go directly from 3 bars of battery life to unable to turn on.Even keeping it plugged in to the car charger it would turn off after a 20 minute conversation, and be unable to turn back on until it had charged for a while.I brought the phone in to an AT&T; wireless store hoping that the salesperson would agree with me that it was most likely a battery problem, and that I could buy a new one and fix the whole problem.  Unfortunately, the salesguy said that they did not carry the batteries for this phone anymore, but that I could get them from AT&T; online.  He also warned me that the symptoms I was describing could mean that my phone was on its last legs, and that I would need to replace it.I went online, but even on the website, AT&T; no longer carried any accessories or batteries for my phone.  Luckily I found this battery for sale here, and although I was nervous about purchasing a battery from an unknown merchant.  The price was better than I ever imagined it would have been, so I decided it was worth the risk for such a low price.When it arrived, it was already half-charged, and I went through the standard charging routine of fully charging, fully discharging several times.  Since getting this battery my phone has stopped all of its foolishness, and seems to be as good as new.  Possibly even better.  Maybe it is wishful thinking, but it seems that the reception has even improved since getting this battery!My only complaint was that I wanted to order a replacement stylus, and I noticed that this same company sold them.  Even though they weigh practically nothing and would be shipped from the same company along with the battery to the same place, they doubled the shipping cost.  This really bugged me because even if they would have been shipped separately, they could be put in an envelope and sent with nothing more than a standard stamp!

The battery arrived a day earlier than expected.  The price couldn't be beat.  We thought the battery would need to be charged, but it was good to go as soon as we inserted it into the phone.  I have never been more satisfied with an on-line purchase.  Thank you.

I ordered this batter replacement and well lets just say my phone stays charged now. I got it for Christmas of 08 and have not been able to use it because the battery was shot. I was afraid of buying the cheap replacement because it was so cheap. I would recommend this to everyone who wants a replacement battery for their 8125. IT HOLDS IT'S CHARGE!!! When it arrived it was 65% charged and has been the best 2.99 I have ever spent.
I've had this battery for about a month now.  It seems to hold the charge just fine.  No problems.  And, you can't beat the price!
summary: seems to work fine so far

reviewText: Battery is holding up well.  Seller shipped quickly and much cheaper than the competitors.

reviewText: The battery came partially charged, so after I popped it in my dinosaur phone, the phone came to life.  So far the battery has held a charge just like the original.  I have had no problems.

reviewText: Unlike other skins reviewed here, this one fits well. Unfortunately it is nearly impossible to use the phone with the cover on. It was nice when I first put it on, but 24 hours later it was covered in dust and oil and I felt the need to wash my hands after each call.  If I wanted that experience, I would have just used the pay phone at the 7-11.  There's probably something better out there.

First of all, the case DOES NOT FIT VERIZON MODELS of this phone. Secondly, it is so cheap feeling and looking.  On the sides, the silicone does not even have a smooth seam its jagged  and rough. I would not recommend this product to anyone, especially not someone with the verizon model which I have discovered is the L7c so its my fault the case does not fit. The company does make other good products so don't be afraid.
The price is the only reason to purchase this case. Any more and this case is not worth it. Easily rips and holes are cut too small. It protects the phone and that is my only concern.

Product works as stated. The plastic is of cheap quality and would probably crack if dropped on somethingother than carpet. The set works fine though and has been hassle free for more thean a year. Price is great compared to retail and if it does get broken, it could be replaced for a fraction of retail pricing.

I don't care much for the shell case. But it does provide protection.What's great is the car charger. Very Useful! And the travel charger I keep at the office. It works fine too. All this for a lot less than what Verizon wanted to charge me. A whole lot less.

I bought one set for me and another for my brother-in-law and both sets broke within a week.  I only paid $5.56 for each, but I don't even want a replacement. The back piece cracked after a few days of use with no drops or any other reason it should have cracked.  The travel charger never worked from the day I got it.  I have the V3m and maybe it works with other versions of the Razr, but not mine.  The only thing that did work was the car charger.  No issues to date, but with the problems of the other 2 items, who knows what will happen.
The front plastic cover does break after 3 months, but it still on the phone. Both home and car charger work without problem. Considering the price, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
Value priced and delivered on time. Contrary to some reviews, the plastic case fits properly and protects the phone. A good buy!

The case fits great, and it hasn't cracked at all.  Both chargers work great! I think maybe my phone charges a bit slower with this wall charger than the one that came with it, but I can't complain! reviewText: This fits the phone perfectly, (snaps into indentations in the phone), but is susceptible to being pulled out easily.  After 1 week of use I am noticing some wear on the plastic parts that snap into place and don’t think this holster will last much longer.

This is a great cell phone holder.  I have purchased several from Verizon at 10 times the price and this has held up just as well.  They all fail over time as you remove and replace the phone the plastic fatigues and finally breaks.  I bought two and saved at least thirty dollars.  Thanks Amazon for making the connection.

Unfortunately this belt clip didn't hold up for me.  Within a week the portion that holds the phone in broke--which was why we replaced the prior clip, but it held out for 1-1/2 years.  We could tell there was a modification in style, even though it had the same item number.  The phone doesn't snap in as securely as the prior model either.

This is exactly what I wanted--something that works like it should. I originally purchased the clip that Verizon offers and my phone fell out three times in two days. Not good for my brand new phone! Moreover, the way you have to push the clip is awkward and hard to maneuver without using two hands. This clip is a one hand operation. Thanks!

reviewText: This holster is by far better than the stock holster that comes with the phone.It has a lower profile which means it sits closer to your belt.It is also is much easier to actuate than the stock holster. The thumb tab is oriented in just the right direction for easy in/out. The phone clips in solidly and doesn't fall out.
